    1: import argparse
    2: import sys
    3: from pathlib import Path
    4: 
    5: from .lib._utils_impl import get_include
    6: from .version import __version__
    7: 
    8: 
    9: def main() -> None:
   10:     parser = argparse.ArgumentParser()
   11:     parser.add_argument(
   12:         "--version",
   13:         action="version",
   14:         version=__version__,
   15:         help="Print the version and exit.",
   16:     )
   17:     parser.add_argument(
   18:         "--cflags",
   19:         action="store_true",
   20:         help="Compile flag needed when using the NumPy headers.",
   21:     )
   22:     parser.add_argument(
   23:         "--pkgconfigdir",
   24:         action="store_true",
   25:         help=("Print the pkgconfig directory in which `numpy.pc` is stored "
   26:               "(useful for setting $PKG_CONFIG_PATH)."),
   27:     )
   28:     args = parser.parse_args()
   29:     if not sys.argv[1:]:
   30:         parser.print_help()
   31:     if args.cflags:
   32:         print("-I" + get_include())
   33:     if args.pkgconfigdir:
   34:         _path = Path(get_include()) / '..' / 'lib' / 'pkgconfig'
   35:         print(_path.resolve())
   36: 
   37: 
   38: if __name__ == "__main__":
   39:     main()
